Home About Syntax Example Programs

Madmaan is a dynamically and strong typed language that simplifies JavaScript's syntax and looks mad, MAN. Hate semi-colons? Well, try out exclamation marks! Does using "!" for "not" not make sense? Okay, use "NOT" instead, MAN. Plus, we know how ugly { } can be. SO. NO. CURLY. BRACKETS, MAN. This language explodes(compiles) into JavaScript, now go get MAD, MAAN.

madmaan is a programming language born from the minds of 7 students who are in a constant search to acquire more street cred (and also perhaps a decent GPA). Mitchell, Alex, Daniel Mondo, Arash, Anthony and Nick based madmaan off of Javascript, striving to make it easier to read. Also, we understand that writing code may not be the most exciting or pleasing thing you could do with a computer therefore we also decided to make the language more "fun" to write.

The idea of making madmaan sound like a disgrunt- I mean "mad" per- I mean "man" came after we thought of the name, which if you look closely was based off of the first letters of each of our names combined (those absolute madmen!).

Program:

Program  ::= Body

no references


Body:

Body     ::= ( Stmt '!' )+

referenced by:

  • ElseIf
  • ForStmt
  • FuncDec
  • IfStmt
  • Program
  • WhileStmt


Stmt:

Stmt     ::= Decl
         | IfStmt
         | WhileStmt
         | ExpStmt
         | ForStmt

referenced by:

  • Body


ForStmt:

ForStmt  ::= 'for' VarDec '!' BinExp2 '!' BinExp3 '!' Body

referenced by:

  • Stmt


Decl:

Decl     ::= FuncDec
         | VarDec

referenced by:

  • Stmt


ExpStmt:

ExpStmt  ::= BinExp2 ( binop BinExp2 )*
         | UnExp
         | CallExp
         | Literal
         | id

referenced by:

  • ElseIf
  • IfStmt
  • Stmt
  • VarDec


IfStmt:

IfStmt   ::= 'if' ExpStmt 'then' Body ElseIf* ( 'else' Body )?

referenced by:

  • Stmt


ElseIf:

ElseIf   ::= 'elif' ExpStmt 'then' Body

referenced by:

  • IfStmt


WhileStmt:

WhileStmt
       ::= 'while' BinExp2 'do' Body

referenced by:

  • Stmt


VarDec:

VarDec   ::= id 'is' ExpStmt

referenced by:

  • Decl
  • ForStmt


FuncDec:

FuncDec  ::= id Params '=>' Body

referenced by:

  • Decl


BinExp2:

BinExp2  ::= BinExp3 ( relop BinExp3 )?

referenced by:

  • ExpStmt
  • ForStmt
  • WhileStmt


BinExp3:

BinExp3  ::= BinExp4 ( addop BinExp4 )*

referenced by:

  • BinExp2
  • ForStmt


BinExp4:

BinExp4  ::= UnExp ( mulop UnExp )*

referenced by:

  • BinExp3


UnExp:

UnExp    ::= CallExp
         | Literal
         | unaop? id unaop?
         | ( '~' | '-' )? id

referenced by:

  • BinExp4
  • ExpStmt


CallExp:

CallExp  ::= id Params

referenced by:

  • ExpStmt
  • UnExp


Params:

Params   ::= '(' ( Param ( ',' Param )* )* ')'

referenced by:

  • CallExp
  • FuncDec


Param:

Param    ::= id

referenced by:

  • Params


Literal:

Literal  ::= boollit
         | intlit
         | strlit

referenced by:

  • ExpStmt
  • UnExp


keywords:

keywords ::= ( 'if' | 'else' | 'elif' | 'or' | 'is' | 'for' | 'and' | 'false' | 'true' | 'while' | 'do' ) idrest

referenced by:

  • id


idrest:

idrest   ::= '_'
         | alnum

referenced by:

  • id
  • keywords


id:

id       ::= keywords letter idrest*

referenced by:

  • CallExp
  • ExpStmt
  • FuncDec
  • Param

binop:

binop    ::= 'or'
         | 'and'

referenced by:

  • ExpStmt


mulop:

mulop    ::= '*'
         | '/'
         | '%'

referenced by:

  • BinExp4


addop:

addop    ::= '+'
         | '-'

referenced by:

  • BinExp3


relop:

relop    ::= '=='
         | '>='
         | '<='
         | '<'
         | '>'
         | '~='

referenced by:

  • BinExp2


unaop:

unaop    ::= '--'
         | '++'

referenced by:

  • UnExp


boollit:

boollit  ::= 'false'
         | 'true'

referenced by:

  • Literal


intlit:

intlit   ::= digit+

referenced by:

  • Literal


strlit:

strlit   ::= '\"' char* '\"'

referenced by:

  • Literal


char:

char     ::= "'" '\"' ( escape | any )

referenced by:

  • strlit


escape:

escape   ::= '\\' ( 'r' | 'n' | "'" | '\"' | coded )

referenced by:

  • char


coded:

coded    ::= 'u' hexDigit hexDigit hexDigit hexDigit
